mapper.insert: insert into partner(partner_no,member_id,category_code,partner_name,partner_phone,partner_addr,partner_rgdate,partner_yn,partner_ydate,partner_pic_name,partner_pic_path,partner_pic_size) values(partner_partner_no_seq.nextval,#{partnerDto.member_id},(select category_code from category where category_mname=#{boardreadDto.category_mname} and category_sname like #{boardreadDto.category_sname}),#{partnerDto.partner_name},#{partnerDto.partner_phone},#{partnerDto.partner_addr},current_date,'N',null,#{partnerDto.partner_pic_name},#{partnerDto.partner_pic_path},#{partnerDto.partner_pic_size})
mapper.select: select * from partner order by partner_no desc

select p.*,c.category_mname mname,c.category_sname sname from partner p,category c where p.category_code=c.category_code and p.category_code=(select category_code from partner where partner_no=#{partnerNo}) and p.partner_no=#{partnerNo}
select * from partner where partner_name like '%'||#{partner_name}||'%' order by partner_name asc
